name: Regions
description:
Regions is an abstract, minimal puzzle game about drawing paths and understanding geometry. The 6 x 6 playing field is divided into different regions and your task is to draw a path that covers only one square of each. Later levels introduce regions that have different mechanics to keep things interesting across 160 levels. Regions also features a dynamic soundtrack that responds to how you play.

Also included is a level editor that unlocks after the entirety of the game is completed (or when a secret code is entered). It isn't a fully polished product, but it's in the game for those who want to mess around with the same tools that were used to make the game.

A color blind option is also available.
